ds_id: Pacific Capital Wealth Advisors Inc. Reduces Stake in Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)@Defense World@2023-06-15 19:54:34.508887@Apple
data_content: Pacific Capital Wealth Advisors has reduced its stake in Apple, selling nearly 5,000 shares in the fourth quarter of 2017. Apple accounts for approximately 0.8% of Pacific Capital's portfolio. The company's holdings in Apple were reportedly worth $3.2m in the most recent reporting period. Meanwhile, several other institutional investors and hedge funds have also recently modified their holdings of AAPL.
